name: Yun Lam
story: Xiang Kuo grew up in a small village in China. When he was 18 years old, he joined the Chinese military and trained as a rifleman. He was stationed in various locations in China and became a skilled marksman. Xiang was then recruited by the OPFOR and is now serving as a private in their ranks. He is quiet and reserved, but is fiercely loyal to his comrades and his country.
